library(grid)
mm <- meme(u, "code", "all the things!", size=.3, color='firebrick')

pushViewport(viewport(width=.9, height=.9))

    vp <- viewport(x = xx[i]/(2*pi), y = (yy[i]-min(yy))/2, width=.05, height=.05)
    print(mm, vp = vp)
}
